reference.shortdesc: Use the verb to generate a PIN and a PIN reference value using the random process. After the PIN is generated, a PIN reference value (PRW) is created. The PIN reference value is used to verify the PIN in other processes. An optional encrypted PIN block is generated for printing.

section.note: If the generated PIN appears in the weak PIN table, the generation process is modified and re-tried until a valid PIN is generated.
section.p: You can use this service to perform the following tasks:

ul.li: Generate an encrypted PIN block in PBF-1 format with a PIN print key to be printed on a PIN mailer.
Generate a PIN reference value which can be used to verify the PIN.

Optionally, generate an encrypted PIN block in PBF-1 format to be stored for later use in personalizing replacement cards, along with a verifying CMAC over the encrypted block and additional card data.

section.note: This verb supports compliant-tagged key tokens.
